title: Bloomberg Markets: SoftBank to Take $4 Billion Stake in Nvidia
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: SoftBank to Take $4 Billion Stake in Nvidia
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Ian King U.S. Semiconductor Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing SoftBank Group Corp. has quietly amassed a $4 billion stake in Nvidia Corp. making it the fourth-largest shareholder in the graphics chipmaker.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
